name: Colorful Abstract Fractal Art / Wallpaper Bundle ~ Liquid Light Series #9
name_original: Colorful Abstract Fractal Art / Wallpaper Bundle ~ Liquid Light Series #9
description:
Colorful Abstract Fractal Art / Wallpaper Bundle ~ Liquid Light Series #9

This bundle contains a seamless tileable digital abstract fractal painting and a set of HD and 4K wallpapers of this art at 16:9 and 9:16 aspect ratios. Fractals are infinitely complex repeating patterns. We are often drawn to fractals because they are found everywhere in nature, and even in our own bodies. This high-vibrational type of art can aid in meditation or elevate your mood just by having it in your environment.

These images will make excellent wallpaper for your computer or mobile device, or a background for your website or videos. Unlike the original art, the wallpaper has been tiled to accommodate HD and 4K resolutions at 16:9 and 9:16 aspect ratios.

You will receive high resolution jpg files of this artwork and wallpaper.

Original Art: 1360 x 768 px

HD Wallpaper: 1920 x 1080 px and 1080 x 1920 px

4K Wallpaper: 4096 x 2304 px and 2304 x 4096 px

This purchase is for personal use only such as wallpaper for your electronic devices or to print out to display in your home or workplace.

For personal use, you are allowed to use this image as a wallpaper for your computer or mobile devices, or as a background for your personal website/blog or videos. You may make a total of three prints of this design for your own use or to give away as gifts. The color of the printed art may vary somewhat from how it appears on your screen depending on your monitor settings and the type of printer and/or paper that you use.

Commercial use is not allowed.

Please read the license file included in your purchase.

If you wish to display this art on your personal blog or social media, please credit me with a link back to my Ko-Fi and/or my website. Suggested text:

Art by Rowan Morgan (AKA The Lemurian Phoenix)

https://ascensionvibrations.com

https://ko-fi.com/ascensionvibrations

As this is a digital download, I am unable to offer refunds or exchanges, but please let me know if there's a problem with your order, and I will resolve it as soon as possible.

Click here to follow me on social media and see my other work.
